div.div:
refactor: refactor and update villager trading items list
- Simplified the items sold by the Cartographer entity in the `VillagerSoldItem` list - Removed `suspicious_stew` from the list of items sold by the Farmer entity - Removed repetition in the list of items sold by the Fletcher and Leatherworker entities - Corrected the capitalization for `Brick` in the list of items sold by the Mason entity - Improved item listing for the Mason, Shepherd and Cartographer entities by using a generic `(Any colored)_` prefix for applicable items.
Signed-off-by: 陳鈞 <jim60105@gmail.com>

refactor: refactor and update villager trading items list
- Simplified the items sold by the Cartographer entity in the `VillagerSoldItem` list - Removed `suspicious_stew` from the list of items sold by the Farmer entity - Removed repetition in the list of items sold by the Fletcher and Leatherworker entities - Corrected the capitalization for `Brick` in the list of items sold by the Mason entity - Improved item listing for the Mason, Shepherd and Cartographer entities by using a generic `(Any colored)_` prefix for applicable items.
Signed-off-by: 陳鈞 <jim60105@gmail.com>

chore: prompt engineering
- Add rule to decline trades involving Netherite and End items in trade restrictions - Remove rule to decline trades involving Netherite items in secondary trade instructions - Add note not to forget the "ACTION:" label when executing a command - Add rule to avoid using markdown syntax in the code
Signed-off-by: 陳鈞 <jim60105@gmail.com>

feat: enhance message formatting and URL interaction
- Introduce additional imports in the `MessageFormatter.kt` file to utilize logging and regex matching capabilities - Modify the `formatMessageFromVillager` function to work with `TextComponent` instead of `Component` - Edit the `formatMessage` implementation to build and return a `TextComponent` message - Implement `clickableLink` function in `MessageFormatter.kt` to match and handle URLs within messages, with hover prompts for safety - Update `TradeOfferProcessor.kt` allowing URLs within traded messages to be clickable links by utilizing the new `clickableLink` function.
Signed-off-by: 陳鈞 <jim60105@gmail.com>

refactor: refactor system prompt generation and enhance villager dialogue
- Refactored `generateSystemPrompt` by segregating the method into more modular sub-methods: `getChatOnlyPrompt`, `getChatAndTradePrompt`, `generateTradePrompt`, `generateChatPrompt`, `generateWorldAndPlayerPrompt`, `generateRestrictionPrompt` - Modified conversation prompts for villager based on its profession. Villagers with 'None' and 'Nitwit' profession have chat-only prompts while others have chat and trade prompts. - Extracted world and player related prompts under the newly created `generateWorldAndPlayerPrompt` from the previously existing method `generateSystemPrompt` - Consolidated restrictions prompts under the newly created `generateRestrictionPrompt` - Revised the way the profession of the villager is determined for personality generation - Made the content of villager dialogue more consistent by transitioning from second-person 'you' to more formal/ respectful 'you' in Chinese - Included configuration for providing topics for villager conversation in `config.yml` with the key `topics` - Removed redundant instructions about refusing trades not in the trade item list
Signed-off-by: 陳鈞 <jim60105@gmail.com>

feat: allow conversations with Non-profession villagers
- Comment out the restriction for conversations with Non-profession villagers in `ConversationEventsHandler`.
Signed-off-by: 陳鈞 <jim60105@gmail.com>

refactor: remove enchantments from villager trade system
Minecraft 1.20.5 has changed syntax from NBT tags to component, so NBT tags will no longer work. At this momtne GPT is not able to generate component correctly.
- Removed the rule about enchantments from the trade rules and edited a trade example accordingly in `VillagerConversation.kt`. - Refactored the item lists of various villager types in `VillagerSoldItem.kt` and removed enchantments from the items. - Added logging utility imports and adjusted import ordering in `TradeOfferProcessor.kt`. - Reformatted the `processMessage` method and adjusted how the `formattedMessage` is constructed in `TradeOfferProcessor.kt`. - Removed extra check for appending symbols while iterating through the recipe ingredients in `TradeOfferProcessor.kt`. - Added line breaks for better readability in `TradeOfferProcessor.kt`.
Signed-off-by: 陳鈞 <jim60105@gmail.com>
